summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4301 for the improvement of the alley in Block 50, replat of Mercer's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue North and Taylor Avenue, from Roy Street to Valley Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51073, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
